original_text: All King Solomon's drinking vessels were of gold, and all the vessels of the House of the Forest of Lebanon were of pure gold. None were of silver; silver was not considered as anything in the days of Solomon.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 마시는 그릇은 다 금이요 레바논 나무 궁의 그릇들도 다 정금이라 은 기물이 없으니 솔로몬의 시대에 은을 귀히 여기지 아니함은

sentences.original_text: All King Solomon's drinking vessels were of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕의 모든 마시는 그릇은 금이었으며

sentences.original_text: and all the vessels of the House of the Forest of Lebanon were of pure gold
sentences.korean_translation: 레바논 나무 궁의 모든 그릇들은 순금이었습니다

sentences.original_text: silver was not considered as anything in the days of Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 시대에는 은이 아무것도 여겨지지 않았습니다
